data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Likhitrakarn, Natdanai, Golovatch, Sergei I., Panha, Somsak (2010): The millipede genus Orthomorpha Bollman, 1893 in Thailand. 1. Revision of the sericata - group, with descriptions of four new species (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae). Zootaxa 2361: 23-45, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193638
